verses.verse: Observe<WH8104> the month<WH2320> of Abib<WH24>, and keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>: for in the month<WH2320> of Abib<WH24> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> brought you forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714> by night<WH3915>.

You shall therefore sacrifice<WH2076> the passover<WH6453> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, of the flock<WH6629> and the herd<WH1241>, in the place<WH4725> which the Lord<WH3068> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name there<WH8034>.

You shall eat<WH398> no leavened bread<WH2557> with it<WH7651>; seven days<WH3117> shall you eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682> with it<WH3899>, even the bread of affliction<WH6040>; for you came forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> in hurry<WH2649>: that you may remember<WH2142> the day<WH3117> when you came forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> all the days<WH3117> of your life<WH2416>.

And there shall be no leavened bread<WH7603> seen<WH7200> with you in all your coast<WH1366> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>; neither shall there any thing of the flesh<WH1320>, which you sacrificedst<WH2076> the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> at even<WH6153>, remain<WH3885> all night until the morning<WH1242>.
You may<WH3201> not sacrifice<WH2076> the passover<WH6453> inside any<WH259> of your gates<WH8179>, which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives you<WH5414>:

But at the place<WH4725> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> in<WH2076>, there you shall sacrifice the passover<WH6453> at even<WH6153>, at the going down<WH935> of the sun<WH8121>, at the season<WH4150> that you came forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>.

And you shall roast<WH1310> and eat<WH398> it in the place<WH4725> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977>: and you shall turn<WH6437> in the morning<WH1242>, and go<WH1980> unto your tents<WH168>.

Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682>: and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> shall be a solemn assembly<WH6116> to the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>: you shall do<WH6213> no work in it<WH4399>.

Seven<WH7651> weeks<WH7620> shall you number<WH5608> unto you<WH2490>: begin to number<WH5608> the seven<WH7651> weeks<WH7620> from such time as you beginnest<WH2490> to put the sickle<WH2770> to the corn<WH7054>.

And you shall keep<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of weeks<WH7620> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with a tribute<WH4530> of a freewill offering<WH5071> of your hand<WH3027>, which you shall give<WH5414> unto the Lord your God<WH3068>, according as the Lord your God<WH430> has blessed you<WH1288>:

And you shall rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, you<WH1121>, and your son, and your daughter<WH1323>, and your manservant<WH5650>, and your maidservant<WH519>, and the Levite<WH3881> that is inside your gates<WH8179>, and the stranger<WH1616>, and the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, that are among<WH7130> you<WH4725>, in the place which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has chosen<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name there<WH8034>.
And you shall remember<WH2142> that you were a bondman<WH5650> in Egypt<WH4714>: and you shall observe<WH8104> and do<WH6213> these statutes<WH2706>.
You shall observe<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, after that you have gathered<WH622> in your corn<WH1637> and your wine<WH3342>:

And you shall rejoice<WH8055> in your feast<WH2282>, you<WH1121>, and your son, and your daughter<WH1323>, and your manservant<WH5650>, and your maidservant<WH519>, and the Levite<WH3881>, the stranger<WH1616>, and the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, that are inside your gates<WH8179>.

Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shall you keep a solemn feast<WH2287> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which the Lord<WH3068> shall choose<WH977>: because the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall bless<WH1288> you in all your increase<WH8393>, and in all the works<WH4639> of your hands<WH3027>, therefore you shall surely rejoice<WH8056>.

Three<WH7969> times<WH6471> in a year<WH8141> shall all your males<WH2138> appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which he shall choose<WH977>; in the feast<WH2282> of unleavened bread<WH4682>, and in the feast<WH2282> of weeks<WH7620>, and in the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521>: and they shall not appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> empty<WH7387>:
Every man<WH376> shall give as he is able<WH4979>, according to the blessing<WH1293> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> which he has given you<WH5414>.

Judges<WH8199> and officers<WH7860> shall you make<WH5414> you in all your gates<WH8179>, which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you<WH7626>, throughout your tribes: and they shall judge<WH8199> the people<WH5971> with just<WH6664> judgment<WH4941>.

You shall not bend<WH5186> judgment<WH4941>; you shall not respect<WH5234> persons<WH6440>, neither take<WH3947> a gift<WH7810>: for a gift<WH7810> does blind<WH5786> the eyes<WH5869> of the wise<WH2450>, and pervert<WH5557> the words<WH1697> of the righteous<WH6662>.
That which is altogether<WH6664> just<WH6664> shall you follow<WH7291>, that you may live<WH2421>, and inherit<WH3423> the land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives you<WH5414>.
You shall not plant<WH5193> you a grove<WH842> of any trees<WH6086> near unto<WH681> the altar<WH4196> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which you shall make you<WH6213>.
Neither shall you set you up<WH6965> any image<WH4676>; which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> hates<WH8130>.
